titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 3 of title 28, United States Code, to provide for 11 circuit judges on the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/1/2007--Introduced. Amends the federal judicial code to reduce the number of judges on the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit from 12 to 11.
